rationale: 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term, not an authorial intensifier on a general risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('completed an initial round', 'all of the tests were negative') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
'have completed', 'were negative', 'said' are plain verbs. 'highly pathogenic' is technical.
Segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports negative tests (positive fact) but does not frame this as an explicit calming cue.
